channel.title: CVE Feed for QNAP Systems Inc. -- Download Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for QNAP Systems Inc. -- Download Station

item.title: CVE-2024-38640|2024-09-06T16:57:49.449Z -- qnap%20systems%20inc. -- download%20station
item.description:
A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability has been reported to affect Download Station. If exploited, the vulnerability could allow authenticated users to inject malicious code via a network.
We have already fixed the vulnerability in the following version: Download Station 5.8.6.283 ( 2024/06/21 ) and later
